Text: I am really pleased to hear about your IT heaven.  But I would have thought that with all that technology you would be able to put together a few screenshots for your posts!

I must agree with paulinwa99. 
Are you just taking up 8.5 GB of bandwidth with total crap? Perhaps instead of blowing your own trumpet you should go blow a rusty trombone.
Screens missing....so why should I download and share?
